summary: Software Engineer II with 4+ years of experience building high-performance web applications. Expert in React.js, Angular, Next.js, and TypeScript, specializing in responsive design and performance optimization.

responsibilities: Leading frontend development for Elemica Capture product automating supply chain order management processes across 50+ enterprise clients
Architected scalable responsive interfaces for complex supply chain workflows handling real-time data processing of 10,000+ daily transactions
Developed reusable Angular component library reducing code duplication by 35% across multiple product modules
Optimized application performance achieving 45% faster page load times through code splitting, lazy loading, and caching strategies
Designed and developed responsive web applications for 8+ high-profile travel and banking clients with emphasis on performance and accessibility
Implemented pixel-perfect UI from design mockups achieving 98% design accuracy across cross-browser compatibility testing
Optimized frontend performance delivering 40% improvement in page load times through code splitting and lazy loading, benefiting 100,000+ monthly active users
Created reusable component library with 50+ components reducing development time by 30% for team of 12 engineers
Integrated Adobe Analytics tracking 500,000+ monthly events resulting in improved product insights and 25% increase in user conversion
Designed and enhanced CRM system frontend impacting 25+ sales teams and managing 50,000+ customer records
Created advanced data visualizations and interactive dashboards increasing user engagement by 35% and reducing data analysis time by 40%
Built responsive design patterns supporting 15+ different screen sizes with 99.2% cross-platform compatibility
Collaborated with 6-person UX/UI team to translate designs into functional, accessible interfaces reducing support tickets by 20%
